sentences.sContent: Our top priorities must be profit and commercial growth.
sentences.sCn: 我们必须把利润和贸易增长作为我们的第一要务。

sentences.sContent: ...their commercial value was first discovered by Portuguese settler...
...regional banks in 2010 as commercial real estate loans come due...
...possibly allowing more commercial endeavors here well before the prohibitions against them expire...
...but also for the strategic and commercial that already exist...
...I'd like to see GM research on less commercial crops...
...and it went into commercial service in 1898...
...It could also insist on checking private manned spacecraft as thoroughly as it does commercial aircraft...
...So what can be done to create more effective managers of the commercial world...
...they have questioned whether the primary responsibility for digitally archiving the world's books should be allowed to fall to a commercial company...

synos.tran: [贸易]商业的；营利的；靠广告收入的

phrases.pCn: 市场价值；经济价值；出售价格
n. 商业财产，商用不动产
商业大厦，商业楼宇；商业建筑物
商业发票，正式签证的贸易发票
商业银行；商业银行业务

words.tran: 商业主义；营利主义；重商主义
使商品化；靠…赚钱（commercialize的过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 商业的， 商务的； 商品化的， 商业性的
trans.tranOther: related to business and the buying and selling of goods and services
